ca.ualbert.cs.tasko.NotificationArtifacts

Class NotificationList

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualbert.cs.tasko.NotificationArtifacts.NotificationList

  • public class NotificationList
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple Variation of an ArrayList to store Notifications. Includes the ability to add/ remove notifications as well as getting Notifications at specific indices or returning the entire ArrayList.
    See Also:
    Notification

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NotificationList()
      Default Constructor.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAll(java.util.Collection<Notification> notifications)
      Utilizes the Collections.addAll() method to add multiple Notifications that are all contained inside a collection to this NotificationList
      void addNotification(Notification notification)
      Adds a Notification to the NotificationList.
      void delete(int index)
      Removes a specific Notification from the NotificationList
      Notification getNotification(int index)
      Returns the Notification found at a specific position in the NotificationList.
      java.util.ArrayList<Notification> getNotifications()
      Get all the Notifications from a NotificationList.
      int getSize()
      Returns the size of the NotificationList (How many Notifications it contains) Needed for RecyclerView Adapter

        public int getSize()
        Returns the size of the NotificationList (How many Notifications it contains) Needed for RecyclerView Adapter
        Returns:

      • addAll

        public void addAll(java.util.Collection<Notification> notifications)
        Utilizes the Collections.addAll() method to add multiple Notifications that are all contained inside a collection to this NotificationList
        Parameters:
        notifications - a collection of Notifications

      • getNotification

        public Notification getNotification(int index)
        Returns the Notification found at a specific position in the NotificationList.
        Parameters:
        index - The interger position of the Notification we wish to return.
        Returns:
        a Notification object.

      • getNotifications

        public java.util.ArrayList<Notification> getNotifications()
        Get all the Notifications from a NotificationList.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList containing all Notification objects stored in the NotificationList.

      • delete

        public void delete(int index)
        Removes a specific Notification from the NotificationList
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the Notification that is requested to be removed.
